note:
Neurodivergent hippie-goth from northern Appalachia

Interests:
Intentional living, Bible study, history, mythology...

I keep a bullet journal, use Linux, my dad writes good books.

Activism is the price we owe for living in this world and I seek to include more and more of it into my life.

I'm recently getting into literature, I enjoy rock music (in many of its forms), melodic & symphonic metal

Open to / seeking recommendations & conversation for music, recipes, gardening, table-top RPGs...
